author: Ed Baines
method: Place all the ingredients into a pan over a medium heat and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 8-10 minutes, or until the rice has absorbed all the liquid.  Transfer to a bowl, drizzle with cream and top with orange segments to serve.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz butter, melted,  100g/3½oz rice,  290ml/½pt milk,  200g/7oz coconut milk,  50g/2oz caster sugar,  drizzle double cream,  orange segments
